current_company.title: Incoming Global Markets Analyst intern @ JP Morgan Chase & Co. | FRM-1 | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: The Inter IIT Sports meet is one of the oldest and premiere sports meet held at university level, where students from all the 23 IITs participate. As a Core Team Member for the same we are working under Technology Students' Gymkhana and are involved in planning, executing and managing all the events for 54th edition of Inter IIT Sports Meet. And currently assisting the head team to run the sponsorship drive for the meet through corporate engagement program.
